message.content: {"id": "4964", "title": "Bug 4964 - Automatic Code Assist needs to be smarter", "description": "Since DISPOSED is first in the list and is selected, I ended up with: button.DISPOSED which isn't even close to what I want, and I have to delete it all and start again, paying more attention this time. Code assist should notice that I have typed a ( and that this matches 'dispose()' far better than 'DISPOSED'. Either that, or it needs to be case sensitive when it is automatically inserting stuff.", "OB": "Code assist should prioritize matching method names over matching variable names.", "EB": "The current implementation of the Code Assist feature does not prioritize matching method names when inserting code automatically. As a result, in this specific scenario, when the user types a '(' after an object name, the code assist mistakenly suggests a variable name instead of a method name.", "SR": "Update the Code Assist feature to prioritize matching method names over variable names when automatically inserting code snippets."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '4964', 'title': 'Bug 4964Automatic Code Assist needs to be smarter', 'description': 'Since DISPOSED is first in the list and is selected, Iended up with:button.DISPOSEDwhich isn\'t even close to what I want, and I have to delete it all and startagain, paying more attention this time.Code assist should notice that I have typed a ( and that this matches "dispose()" far better than "DISPOSED".Either that, or it needs to be case sensitivewhen it is automatically inserting stuff. ', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'Bug 4964Automatic Code Assist needs to be smarter ', 'SR': ''}
